info.name: Portfolio API
info.description:
API documentation for Omar El Naggar's Portfolio Web API.

Base URL: https://omarelnaggar.runasp.net

## Authentication
Some endpoints require the `X-Admin-Secret` header for authorization.

item.name: Contact
item.description: Contact form endpoints for sending messages

request.description:
Send a contact message via email.

**Request Body:**
- `name` (string, required): Sender's name (max 100 characters)
- `email` (string, required): Sender's email address
- `message` (string, required): Message content (max 2000 characters)

**Responses:**
- `200 OK`: Message sent successfully
- `400 Bad Request`: Invalid input data
- `500 Internal Server Error`: Failed to send email

Get all projects.

**Responses:**
- `200 OK`: Returns list of all projects
- `404 Not Found`: No projects found

Get all starred/featured projects.

**Responses:**
- `200 OK`: Returns list of starred projects
- `404 Not Found`: No starred projects found

formdata.value: A detailed description of the project and its features.
C#, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, SQL Server

request.description:
Add a new project.

**Authentication Required:** `X-Admin-Secret` header

**Request Body (form-data):**
- `Id` (int): Project ID (use 0 for new)
- `Name` (string): Project name
- `Description` (string): Project description
- `EndDate` (datetime, optional): Completion date
- `CodeUrl` (string, optional): Source code URL
- `DemoUrl` (string, optional): Live demo URL
- `Star` (boolean): Featured project flag
- `Technologies` (string, optional): Technologies used
- `Image` (file, optional): Project image

**Responses:**
- `201 Created`: Project created successfully
- `401 Unauthorized`: Invalid or missing admin secret
- `500 Internal Server Error`: Failed to create project

Edit an existing project.

**Authentication Required:** `X-Admin-Secret` header

**Request Body (form-data):**
- `Id` (int, required): Project ID to edit
- `Name` (string): Project name
- `Description` (string): Project description
- `EndDate` (datetime, optional): Completion date
- `CodeUrl` (string, optional): Source code URL
- `DemoUrl` (string, optional): Live demo URL
- `Star` (boolean): Featured project flag
- `Technologies` (string, optional): Technologies used
- `Image` (file, optional): Project image

**Responses:**
- `204 No Content`: Project updated successfully
- `401 Unauthorized`: Invalid or missing admin secret
- `404 Not Found`: Project not found
- `500 Internal Server Error`: Failed to update project

variable.description: ID of the project to delete

request.description:
Delete a project by ID.

**Authentication Required:** `X-Admin-Secret` header

**Path Parameters:**
- `projectId` (int): ID of the project to delete

**Responses:**
- `204 No Content`: Project deleted successfully
- `401 Unauthorized`: Invalid or missing admin secret
- `404 Not Found`: Project not found
- `500 Internal Server Error`: Failed to delete project

request.description:
Add a new work experience.

**Authentication Required:** `X-Admin-Secret` header

**Request Body:**
- `id` (int): Use 0 for new entries
- `company` (string, required): Company name
- `role` (string, required): Job title/role
- `description` (string): Job description
- `startDate` (datetime): Start date of employment
- `endDate` (datetime, optional): End date (null for current position)
- `workArrangement` (int): Work arrangement type:
  - `0` = Onsite
  - `1` = Hybrid
  - `2` = Remote

**Responses:**
- `201 Created`: Work experience created successfully
- `401 Unauthorized`: Invalid or missing admin secret
- `500 Internal Server Error`: Failed to create work experience

request.description:
Edit an existing work experience.

**Authentication Required:** `X-Admin-Secret` header

**Request Body:**
- `id` (int, required): ID of the work experience to edit
- `company` (string, required): Company name
- `role` (string, required): Job title/role
- `description` (string): Job description
- `startDate` (datetime): Start date of employment
- `endDate` (datetime, optional): End date (null for current position)
- `workArrangement` (int): Work arrangement type:
  - `0` = Onsite
  - `1` = Hybrid
  - `2` = Remote

**Responses:**
- `200 OK`: Work experience updated successfully
- `401 Unauthorized`: Invalid or missing admin secret
- `404 Not Found`: Work experience not found
- `500 Internal Server Error`: Failed to update work experience
